hu.akarnokd.reactive4java.swing

Class SwingObservables.ObservableMouseListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • hu.akarnokd.reactive4java.reactive.DefaultObservable<MouseEvent>
      • hu.akarnokd.reactive4java.swing.SwingObservables.ObservableMouseListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Observable<MouseEvent>, Observer<MouseEvent>, MouseListener, MouseMotionListener, MouseWheelListener, Closeable, AutoCloseable, EventListener
    Enclosing class:
    SwingObservables

    public static class SwingObservables.ObservableMouseListener
extends DefaultObservable<MouseEvent>
implements MouseListener, MouseMotionListener, MouseWheelListener
    The observable mouse listener which relays all mouse related events (movement, clicks, wheel) to next(). events and relays it to next(). The original type can be determined by using MouseEvent.getID() which can be one of the following value:
    • MouseListener events
      • MouseEvent.MOUSE_CLICKED
      • MouseEvent.MOUSE_PRESSED
      • MouseEvent.MOUSE_RELEASED
      • MouseEvent.MOUSE_ENTERED
      • MouseEvent.MOUSE_EXITED
    • MouseMotionListener events
      • MouseEvent.MOUSE_MOVED
      • MouseEvent.MOUSE_DRAGGED
    • MouseWheelListener events
      • MouseEvent.MOUSE_WHEEL
    This observable never signals finish() or error().
    Author:
    akarnokd, 2011.02.01.

      • register

        public static SwingObservables.ObservableMouseListener register(Component component)
        Convenience method to register an observer on the component for all mouse event types. To unregister, use the Component.removeMouseListener(), Component.removeMouseMotionListener() and Component.removeMouseWheelListener() methods.
        Parameters:
        component - the target component.
        Returns:
        the new observable

      • registerWith

        public SwingObservables.ObservableMouseListener registerWith(Component component)
        Convenience method to register this observer with the target component for all mouse event types. To deregister this observable, use the unregisterFrom().
        Parameters:
        component - the target component
        Returns:
        this

      • registerWith

        public SwingObservables.ObservableMouseListener registerWith(Component component,
                                                    boolean normal,
                                                    boolean motion,
                                                    boolean wheel)
        Convenience method to register this observer with the target component for any mouse event types. To deregister this observable, use the unregisterFrom().
        Parameters:
        component - the target component
        normal - register for normal events?
        motion - register for motion events?
        wheel - register for wheel events?
        Returns:
        this
